item.title: The World of Lambdas
item.description: Introduction To World Of Lambdas. Lambda expression is appearing in every other programming language and gaining a popularity amongs the developers. So what is the lambda expression? Why should we use it? Is it just anonymous function? what powers does it gives to programmer? Lets discuss all this in details in this series of posts. In this post, we will see the brief introduction to lambda expressions and how to express them in programming language independent way.
